name: European Organic Fertilizers Manufacturers Association
goal:
1) Contact point for the regulatory and supervisory authorities in the European Union (harmonisation EU legislation of organic fertilisers, regulation animal by-products, â€¦)

2) Defending the quality of organic fertilisers in the European Union, in order to safeguard the interests of both consumers and crops.

3) Promotion of organic fertilisers for the advancement of sustainable agri- & horticulture and a healthy environment.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Food Safety
euInitiatives: Harmonisation of the EU fertilizer regulation especially with regards to organic fertilizers and fertilising raw materials
